item.description:
Click Here to learn more and register

Bring Your Spouse For Only $10. When registering for this event, you must select the 2 person registration option to take advantage of this offer. Don't enter the name of your guest - don't click on the "Add a guest" checkbox. Simply mark the box next to your name and click continue.

You Will Learn:
* How to Create Credibility Even if You're Broke
* Finding Deals NOT in Competition with Others
* Buying the Non-Traditional Way
* Uncovering Hidden Profits Available in ANY Deal
* How to Take Over Someone Else's Loan with NO Money
* Moneymaking Holding Asset Secrets
* Deals Making Telephone Secrets
* Which Properties to Hold and How to Do It
* Buying and Selling Using Lease Option and Agreement for Deed Techniques
* Renovations - How to Make Huge Cash Now
* Accelerating Your Cash Flow Using "Profit Centers"
* Case Studies: Secrets of How They Were Found, Negotiated and Sold
* How to Protect Your Deal From Being Sold to Someone Else
* Creating Your Real Estate Wealth Mind Set
* How to Pay ZERO Taxes on Your Real Estate Portfolio
* Taking Title the Right Way for Maximum Safety and Profit
* When & How to Quit the Full Time "Golden Handcuffs" of the Corporate Job
* Having Tenants Leave Your Property in Better Condition When You Gave It to Them
* How toHave Manager Rather than Owner
* Why Land and Personal Property Trusts are the Best Entity
* How Trusts Protect Your Assets
* Multiple Trust Strategies
* How to Paper Train Attorneys on Land Trusts
* The Due-on-Sale Clause - What it is and How to Avoid it Legally
* How to Create Retirement Accelerators
* And MUCH More

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: Weekend Real Estate Investing Seminar with Louis Brown
